text: Phil Lollar (born August 6, 1959 in Klamath Falls, Oregon) is an American actor, director, producer and writer best known for co-creating the radio drama Adventures in Odyssey. He also worked on The Mr. Men Show, providing the voices of Mr. Small, Mr. Strong, and Mr. Lazy, and served as its casting director. Category:American voice actors Category:1959 births Category:Living people
title: Phil Lollar
